overview: Mitch Bishop is the iRise Chief Marketing Officer. Bishop is in charge of overall marketing strategy and execution at iRise. He has many years of marketing and sales experience building successful enterprise software businesses at Scopus, Sybase, Wind River Systems and Ingres. He also held senior engineering positions at Altos Computer Systems, Zilog and Amdahl at the beginning of his career. Mitch holds a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Connecticut. Mitch sits on the governing council of the International Motor Racing Research Center (IMRRC) based in Watkins Glen, NY.
